messages.text:
Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go-tour.googlecode.com/hg

*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go-tour/source/detail?r=dc46daccf760 ***

gotour: advertise other language translations

R=golang-dev, bradfitz
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/5298074

LGTM Do the cool HTML5 kids not close their

tags these days? 2011/10/27 > Reviewers: golang-dev_googlegroups.com, > > Message: > Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com, > > I'd like you to review this change to > https://go-tour.googlecode.**com/hg > > > Description: > gotour: advertise other language translations > > Please review this at http://codereview.appspot.com/**5298074/ > > Affected files: > M static/index.html > > > Index: static/index.html > ==============================**==============================**======= > --- a/static/index.html > +++ b/static/index.html > @@ -89,7 +89,7 @@ > available in this sandboxed version. >

> To run the tour locally first > - install > Go (the latest stable release, release.r60.1), > + install > Go (the latest stable release, release.r60), > then use > goinstall > to install > @@ -104,6 +104,23 @@ > "index" button.) > > > +

> +

Go local

> +

> + The tour is available in other languages: > +

    > +
  • Japanese > — 日本語
    • > +
  • Korean > — 한국어
    • > +
> +

> + (If you would like to translate the tour to another language, check > + out the source from https://go-tour.**googlecode.com/hg > , > + translate static/index.html**, and then deploy it to > App > + Engine using the instructions in appengine/README.**) > +

> + Click the "next" button or type PageDown to continue. > +

> + >
Introduction
> >
> > >

On 28 October 2011 10:55, Brad Fitzpatrick wrote: > LGTM > Do the cool HTML5 kids not close their

tags these days? I don't think you've ever needed to. (just like
  • )

subject: code review 5298074: gotour: advertise other language translations
